name: Look Closer
description:
In this short game, all the eyes are looking at you... Well, all the eyes except two, and you must find them before your light fades away.

  • Use arrow keys to move
  • Use space to start and to accuse an eye of being an imposter when you're on it
  • I run short of time so there is no real ending to this game, juste a quick jingle when you find the two imposters.

Made in 4 hours, live on twitch, for the Trijam #76 (Theme: Imposters)

Code, art and design : Géraud Zucchini

Music : Antoine Druaux

Inspired by Jess Marfisi art
